Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 020065 ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 1 to allow Modification of  Section 37-04(d)(3) and Section 37-04(f)(1) Urban Plaza requirements.
